Blog.post: Day3(the Final Day) Once again Todd woke us up at 6:30, grrrrrrrrrrr, we packed up, went to eat in the cafeteria. The guys got together in the gym for like an hour. We had a "guy talk" about sexuality and how it should be respected. haha the guy was stupid who gave the talk. but had some good stories like, one guy loved life so much, but one day he got his arm stuck between a boulder and a clif side while hiking ALONE. So he waited 3 days. He eventually cut his arm off w/a sharp rock. it took him HOURS! but he lived because he loves life so much, his arm means nothing. After that we headed over to the Conference. We had the worst seats! but it was ok. We sang praise and worship, by now i was beat. i was tired as i could be, and my clafs hurt from jumping. Then Mass started it was ok until the homily, geeze the guy could talk for forever! lol but it was soon time for communion. but during the blessing of the host, a girl was rendered unconcious by the holy spirit...in regular day MASS! how power is God...wow...haha...but she was unconcious for like 20. Then she woke up and we were all Dancing and SCreaming HAVING THE BEST TIME! the the bus ride home was fun lol, i watched people ply Maffia

Day2 Ok Todd woke us up at 6:30. I went to the restroom cleaned up, went to breakfast, went to the conference and saved some seats. Then Praise and worship began. You should have seen everyone. they were all into it so much. It was really amazing. And my group looked really kool in our matching shirts, lol. Praise and worship lasted a while. Then it was eventually time for mass. Yeah Mass was long especially communion. But i LIVED! Lunch was right after that. mmmmmmmmmmmmmmm food. we had sandwhiches then. Lol richard made a pyrmid out of the boxes...i mean he is like 6'+ and he could barely be seen over the top. Then the group moved its way back to the Conference. More Praise and worship. Then we split up. I stayed to hear a Father talk about the Media and hop it was affecting us all. Yeah it totally changed my veiws. It was nasty too. half naked women in ads. i cant believe its not illegal, but i realized what i needed to do. I have decided i will go into the media and forever change it. Thats my life goal now. Next the "young apostles" had a skit thingy where people ate things ina certain amount of bites. the a girl had to eat someSPAM! lol she backed out right away and called up Fr. Jose. he ate it! i was amazed lol. after that, Adoration. Adoration is when the Bishop brings in the body of christ(most people will say its a piece of unlevened bread) but catholics believe its Jesus, but its when you express your intense regard and love and devotion to God and Jesus through deep mediation and prayer and ask for help if needed. But i couldnt believe my ears and eyes. Steubenville adoration is like no other. People opened themselves to demonic forces, others were rendered unconcious by the holy spirit. People were crying hysterically once the Bishop entered for no reason. People started laughing, for no reason. But really the holy spirit had entered and caused all this. I didnt realize what i had revieved from the holy spirit at the time. What did i recieve? I recieved belief. I had been dobuting God, but now, i cant think why i did. He is real! HE REIGNS! DONT FORGET!, after adoration we danced praised like no other lol. then My sis and I went to get emily a present and so we did. Then our group talked about our adoration expreience. it was a fun night. But once we got back to the dourms it was almost time for bed. but Todd bout all they guys a pizza lol. nothing better than Steubenville pizza! but then i heard something amazing. som guys were making their own music and dancing just cuz they wanted to! it was SO awsome. they were making a beat w/ empty bottles and some's guitar. It was fun. b4 i knew it, the time was 12:30, lights out. End of Day2.

Day1 I packed up made sure i had everything. Kelly and I go to the church, find out we would leave like 30 min later, but i had a perfect time to look arround and see who is comming. I didnt know anyone that was lol. But then we packed up and went on the Charter busses and set off. About an hour into the trip someone asked Todd(my youth group leader) to put in Finding Nemo. You would think YAY! FINDING NEMO! but now everyone was like NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO! lol AGAIN they said no because Todd lectured us on how Disney has a deeper meaning. A bad meaning. I mean it makes sense but come on i have heard that story like 5 times. lol. So eventually it went on. We made it into Lousiana arround 3 and stopped in Shreveport. Fun time. I went to Wendies to eat it was good. Then I went back on the bus where I called sarah. Neways the next thing i know i hear yellling. lol. Austin spilled some one's frosty on the seat. haha. it looked like poo. lol. We moved on to Alexandria from there. Nothing happened until we arrived at our Dourms. All the guys got off and went to their rooms. i found a nice spot set my sleeping bag and my boat up(lol my inflatable pool boat kept my comfy from the hard floors). Next we all went to the place where they held the Conference. We did some praise and worship for about 5 hours. then we went back to the dourms. we had about 30 min till we went to bed so i learned a card game. then it was 12:30 lights out. Day 1 came to an end.
Hey im bored, no one is talking to i think i will tell the whole story of my Steubenville weekend. O.K.

Hey this is new so ill try to keep it simple. This is now the summer of 04. Summer is almost over, and Steubenville has passed, not much to look foreward to anymore, but hopefully the effects of steubenville will last. If u ever need help on anything im here ok? Just IM me at TheMatrixIsDown. The song on my site i love it so much. It makes me happy every time i hear it haha. well ill be stopping now. Talk to you next entry. Sven

WHEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE... *ahem* ok well... Today 6flags, emily came. WOAH! HAHAHAHAHA! i got u to go to Mass! :P lol she hasnt gone to mass in idk how long but today i got her to go hehehehehe. Then while i was at 6flags, bobby and i went to duel on DDR obviousley he beat me cuz i suk at the metal pad. but yeah then we finished for then bleh i was about to throw up. then bobby made me "scout" haha he wanted girls to come up and talk to us tooo bad! then i hung w/emily geeze it wasnt fun until 3. Emily and I had a waterbottle fight, she won, i got soaked. then lol we all went on a log ride. bobby splashed us like no other. we were soaked. you could see a lil through the back of emily's tshirt, obviousley i ignored it. Then we went to dry off on the Bobsled ride. big mistake. we all went at once. i had to get emily to sit too close for comfort for me BLEH! (sorry if ur reading this emily it wasnt that bad haha) but i wont go into detail. then at the end of the ride WE GOT STUCK! bobby and i could just stand up in the cart and walk out but they wouldnt let us! GRRRRRRRRRRRR. 30 min having my Ex in my lap not the best day haha. but yeah. then we left and emily was all sad and wont tell me why still! but i think i know why. its prob not true.

WHEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE ttyl

Hey nothing really happened today. i just woke up, played DDR (what a suprise!) then i went to the church to help bleech moldy chairs (bleh) then came home to DDR AGAIN! but this time i was rocking! lol nothing like Heavy mode...haha...bobby is sooooooo gonna beat me. Well im excited 2 days till 6flags haha! yay! but idk if sarah will go now...but yeah neways. I also finished the steubenville video to make it full length. yeah but nothing happened today yeah. bye

It is only in texas where you meet the Misquitos on Steroids, and also lousiana. It is only in Texas where you are driven to the limits by the Misquitos on Steroids to the point where u spray bug spray in your room. Only in Texas. HAHA. Only in texas youll find you most common friend, the cockroach, and they fly too!. HAHA. Only in texas...(haha good times Chris) Well its been fun. Guess what!? you all missed 7/11 day w/FREE, yes i said FREE SLURPEES! hahaha so fun! but yeah im keeping a log for alexandra cuz she is in france...lucky...but yeah today has been, idk, weird. Well i found out some things i may have not wanted to know. (im so worried zach! PRAY!) but things will move on, just dont forget the big guy above. then when i was at Driver's ED. it was ok. not the best day ("whats that sign!?" "what sign?" "that sign that says wrong way" "ooooooooooooooo" haha good times kelly) but it was fine. Then when i was gone brandi IMed me. I really need to talk to her! (dont do it again brandi). Then DDR. HEAVY MODE BABY WAHOO!(right on ZACH! and Bobby, no way i can play that song (my generation) its not even on my version, silly bobby) wow alot of insiders. well i dont think there is much more to say cept, RISE UP AND WALK IN THE LIGHT WAHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO! YEAH! ya hear me!? WOOT! .......haha html style im such a geek

Hey guys, stressed out i am. So here i gooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo. Well i just got a letter from my youth group (LifeTeen) it reads " You probably just arrived home from your weekend at stubenville. Hopefully this weekend will springboard for a very meaningful spiritual journey (haha yeah it will). God has given u a gift this weekend...yatta yatta yatta(a ha ! here we go the point i was going to make) Add some more prayer time,...blah blah blah, What ever you decide, it is your time with your best friend and your creator." there. I feel like im being pulled away from him. Lately i have been stressed. Thinking too much. Worrying about my social life. I need to stop focusing on it. I have been getting worse about it. The online thing also. I have been mean to people lately (sorry sarah) but i cant explain. I need a break from all this. I know more people also have this problem. Just want to get away from it all. And school will be starting soon. wow. but yeah. if yall need help or w/e with that stuff im here. im feeling ya. But right now. Social life, it shall BURN! hahaha. to bad it cant. for too long i have kept Christ back i need to rise up go against the flow, walk in the light NOT LET THE DEVIL IN! YA HEAR ME!? AGREE YEAH! WAHOOOOOOOOO! bye

Well this week. VBS all week! wow it got tiring. But i made a video for each day ( 4 OF THEM!) and eachday someone asked me"how much are you getting paid" (NONE!), Did you really do that?!(YES!), ori hear your going to be come a producer.(well maybe.) but yeah people were impresse by my stupid videos. haha only if they paid attention to my errors in them, bleh! well neways its been a long week im tired. Idk i am tired of this 0 comments crap. COME ON! i made it so everyone could comment...w/e. Lately at VBS, i love what im doing making videos that proclaim god is there! its something im being called to do, well i think...but yeah i have gotten compliments left and right geeze makes me feel good. im going bye

hahaha im in a strong bad mood, hahaha and remember the time when..."Hey im trevor and i am a vampire" hahaha...were gonna miss u trevor :'( ...and then..."i got u a fashon card 'oooooooo how did u know?!' hey cheerleader i got you a gizel carcue *silence* YAY GIZEL CARCUS!...hahahaha...The system is down the system is down, dowa down, dowa down, hahaha and then "It is with my heavy heart to inform you that your son has exploded in a firey ball...thats was visiable from space, and did noway beat the everliving snot out of me" hahaha "I HOPE YOUR HAPPY KEVIN!" hahahaha...then..."Radioactivity is here, Radioactivity is here! Growing arms out of heads is here, today!" hahahaha, and then...sorry last 1 i promise... "way to go texas" hahahah whooooo good times...

well i found someone found this poem and showed it to me, wow i think it really speaks for its self how guys and girls communicate... -BOY: i SAW HER TODAY GiRL: i SAW HiM TODAY -BOY: iT SEEMS LiKE iT`S BEEN FOREVER GiRL: i WONDER iF HE STiLL CARES -BOY: SHE LOOKS BETTER THEN BEFORE GiRL: i COULDN`T STOP STARiNG AT HiM -BOY: i ASKED HER HOW THiNGS WERE GOiNG GiRL: i ASKED ABOUT HiS NEW GiRLFRiEND -BOY: i`D CHOOSE HER OVER ANY GiRL i`M WiTh GiRL: HE`S PROBABLY REALLY HAPPY RiGHT NOW -BOY: i COULDN`T LOOK AT HER WiTHOUT STARTiNG TO CRY GiRL: HE COULDN`T EVEN LOOK AT ME -BOY: i TOLD HER i MiSS HER GiRL: HE DOSEN`T MEAN iT BOY: i MEANT iT GiRL: HE DiDN`T MEAN iT -BOY: i LOVE HER GiRL: HE LOVES HiS NEW GiRLFRiEND -BOY: i HELD HER FOR THE LAST TiME GiRL: HE GAVE ME A FRiENDLY HUG -BOY: THEN i WENT HOME AND CRiED GiRL: THEN i WENT HOME AND CRiED -BOY: i LOST HER GiRL: i STiLL LOVE HIM

-Yeah that's another symptom that all girls experience. i call it "exaggeration of everything to make the ex jealous" -ITS WORKING! haha thats all i have to say... o and also.. new DDR PAD WooT! and also... NEW-DDR MAX! WOOT!!! so fun, sweating all down my back for the love of the game...want a challange. i think not! hahahaha! gtg to bed VBS tomorrow making videos...haha

yeah i have been... ... ... ... Bored lately, so i havent really updated much so yeah w/e. Well, u know, i did change my site background music, so i did accomplish something new. School is comming up soon, itll be fun, i just cant wait to c my old friends. then also idk, i just, idk lol. but itll be fun at clark. I found out i only have 1 class w/rebecca and 1 class w/sarah, o well atleast were in a class together, but w/e. recently this one person i have talked to online, i wont mention her name, she is kinda weird to me. she gave up her faith, but in a situtation u would think u would want to be stronger in your faith. doesnt make sense to me, but neways... i tried convincing her to go into her faith again, but then again, most people dont veiw thing as the way i do. it just bothers me that someone cant believe in anything. i guess ill just have to accept the fact people can go through life clueless. O! i heard this on the radio, this might help out some people who read this: Is it a sin to swear? well, it isnt written in the commandments, but the only thing that relates to it is "Thou shall not use the Lords name in vain" by yelling out jesus christ and o my god as a swear word. but it does say in some parts of the bible that a person should not say words that would insult or make others feel bad....well yeah i gtg to Drivers Ed. now... P.S. If yall want to email me, like about something to write about or w/e or make a crappy story, just email me or leave a comment...(my email= urlLink shotpaintballer@comcast.net )

Last night i was lying in my bed...ARGH! i yelled as i strained and struggled endlessly. i couldnt sleep. i streatched maybe to help me relax, ARGH! i hurt even worse. I closed my eyes. Thinking of something nice in my mind nothing. everything was bothering me. It was too hott. There were too many arrows. it was too...too, i never found out. Why was this happening to me u say? well too much DDR was simply to blame. I just came back at 10 pm from Main Event. The DDR machine there was nice. I left my house to go to main event arround 3. stayed till 10. sweating like crazy after the 1st 15 min. yeah it was all good. now i dont know what to say, nothing really to explain, cept for the pain i am in. well yep, nothing left to say... hopefully i can sleep better now...
